attributes.action: Inform S. Warriner and others that the Freemasons already have an open membership book that may be viewed by the public and that the Freemasons are not a secret society but a society with secrets.  It is a fallacy to presume that the Freemasons do anything different than those that belong to various other organisations, like the round table, chambers of commerce, the lions the buffalos and many other such organisations.  Yes, I am an ex-Freemason.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
